DataElement.preferredName: Asthma Medication Personal Medical History Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the indicator relating to medication use and asthma.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to medication (a biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities) and a history of asthma.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A chronic respiratory disease manifested as difficulty breathing due to the narrowing of bronchial passageways.

Concepts.definition: A chronic respiratory disease manifested as difficulty breathing due to the narrowing of bronchial passageways.

Property.preferredDefinition: biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the indicator relating to medication use and personal medical history.

PermissibleValues.value: Yes, only with flare-ups of my lung disease

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Yes, I take medicines regularly even when I'm not having a flare-up

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
